column4: in x11.org under "section device" it says Configured Video Device"
how to do that how to add edger ppa...?
ok thanks i will try uncle google
so how do i install glx package
Make sure x11-server-utils and mesa-utils are installed
You dont need an xorg.conf with newer versions of X and open drivers like intel
glxinfo is provided by the mesa-utils package
What is the output of glxinfo|grep renderer ?
So it looks like your graphics are fine
